description_long: Node-RED is a programming tool for wiring together hardware devices, APIs and online services in new and interesting ways.
It provides a browser-based editor that makes it easy to wire together flows using the wide range of nodes in the palette that can be deployed to its runtime in a single-click.
hint: The 'http in' node can only be called from a paired terminal
If you have the Mosquitto app installed, you can connect to it using MQTT nodes: the server name is 'mosquitto' and the port is '1883'
